room_title: Escape room "Mark Twain Museum" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: Went to their KC location last year and was excited to see they opened a Como location. Did the Twain room today. They spent a lot of money on the props and puzzles. A fun afternoon with family. Customer service was great.

room_title: Escape room "Mark Twain Museum" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: This was my first escape room experience and we had a blast! We did the Mark Twain Museum room and it was really well put together and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Mark Twain Museum" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: My wife and I completed our first ever escape room here and it was incredible! We finished the Twain room with seconds to spare. The staff was extremely friendly and the room was challenging but not impossible. We loved it here and will be recommending this place to everybody! Thank you for the amazing experience!

room_title: Escape room "Mark Twain Museum" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: Took my wife here with our friends for her birthday. We will be back. Even the kids had fun! Awesome experience! Learned a lot about Mark Twain.
